typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrderDetails
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrder
CloudSalesOrder, CloudSalesOrderDetails join(CloudSalesOrder@OrderID == CloudSalesOrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinOrderAndOrderDetails
